casebody.data:
MEEMIC INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellant,
v.
Louise M. FORTSON and Richard A. Fortson, Individually and as Conservator for Justin Fortson, Defendants/Counterplaintiffs-Appellees. SC: 158302
COA: 337728 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 16, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants/counterplaintiffs-appellees to extend the time for filing their brief on appeal is GRANTED. The brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before September 11, 2019.
